data.name: Legend of the Phoenix
data.detailed_description:
If only life were as beautiful as at first sight,
Full of happiness and bliss when we were together.
We were meant to be loving each other,
Why does it have to end with us parting?
《Legend of the Phoenix》is an otome game genre which focuses on ancient style love story. With every choice that you made at the fork road, there will be ups and downs. It might be for the better. During your solo journey in the game, you will get to meet different kinds of people. With your confidants and partners, you will feel the enjoyment of admiring the beautiful scenery. You will never feel lonely again.
New style of experiencing storyline, character development system, different types of traditional China costume style. Confess your love to him, understanding each other more and relive the love that you were expecting for. Although it may seem like I'm waiting for someone else while drinking a cup of tea, but
actually I am waiting for you.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Korean, Thai
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 仅支持 Windows 7 及其以后的版本，之前的版本中是不能工作的。
  • Additional Notes: 对于 Windows 提供 x86 和 amd64 (x64) 版本的二进制文件。需要注意的是ARM 版本的 Windows 目前尚不支持.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 对于 OS X 系统仅有64位的二进制文档，支持的最低版本是 OS X 10.8
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 及更新 Fedora 21 Debian 8
  • Additional Notes: 预编译的 ia32(i686) 和 x64(amd64) 版本 Electron 二进制文件都是在Ubuntu 12.04 下编译的，arm 版的二进制文件是在 ARM v7（硬浮点 ABI 与Debian Wheezy 版本的 NEON）下完成的。
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
